mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_c(reportno, memberno, contentsno, reason, rdate) VALUES(report_c_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{contentsno}, #{reason), sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT reportno, memberno, contentsno, reason, rdate FROM report_c WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY reportno DESC
